titles.title: Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhamad Yunus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Harper asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/11/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the use of the Capitol rotunda on April 17, 2013, for a ceremony to award the congressional gold medal to Professor Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty.
